description: Enterprise reporting table for Contact specific point items in Patient education record.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the Patient education point. This is contact specific.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date in external format.

columns.name: CONTACT_POINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for education point for the patient education contact.

columns.name: CNT_POINT_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for education point's topic for the patient education contact.

columns.name: CNT_POINT_TITLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for education point's title for the patient education contact.

columns.name: CNT_POINT_KEY
columns.description: The education point key for contact-specific history. This is a string in the form of Title^Topic^Point.

columns.name: CNT_POINT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of the patient education point. A category item.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


N/A


Done


Deleted


Not Started


In Progress

columns.name: CNT_POINT_IED_ID
columns.description: The identifier for the Education point (IED) record. This ID is in internal format and can be used to link to the point (IED) record.

columns.name: CNT_MYPOINT_HNO_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the note associated with the My Point. My Point is created on the fly and this ID, together with the contact date (DAT), can be used to link to the associated note.

columns.name: CNT_MYPOINT_HNO_DA
columns.description: Contact date for the note associated with the My Point. My Point is created on the fly and this contact date (DAT), together with the note (HNO) ID, can be used to link to the associated note.

columns.name: CNT_POINT_EDU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the education detail record that contains additional details about this point for this encounter.

columns.name: POINT_WAS_SUG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this point was suggested by the EMR. Y indicates that this point was suggested by the EMR. N or null indicates that this point was not suggested by the EMR.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: POINT_ADDED_FROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for how this point was added to the patient's chart. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Education


Care Plan


Doc Flowsheet


Order


Order Set


Pathway


Task Template


Interface


Patient Assigned Task


Utility

columns.name: POINT_ALT_CSN_ID
columns.description: If this point was added to the patient's chart based on a BestPractice Advisory, then this is the unique contact serial number of the alert (ALT) contact that is used to track the firing of that BestPractice Advisory. If this point was not added based on a BestPractice Advisory, then this is null.

columns.name: CNCT_FIRST_DOSE_MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication record associated with a first-dose education point. This is blank for points that are not associated with first-dose education for a medication.
